name: v1.6.2
body:
## What's Changed
 - Fix `no getter available for X-Terraform-Get source protocol` when using bare github or bitbucket hostnames: #370

name: v2.1.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Multiple fixes for go-getter v2 by @nywilken in https://github.com/hashicorp/go-getter/pull/361
* Update X-Terraform-Get error messaging to match v1 by @nywilken in https://github.com/hashicorp/go-getter/pull/364
* Update default Getters with known defaults by @nywilken in https://github.com/hashicorp/go-getter/pull/363


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/hashicorp/go-getter/compare/v2.0.2...v2.1.0

name: v1.6.1
v2.0.2
body:
## What's Changed
* update s3 gcs and cmd to use most recent v2 module by @azr in https://github.com/hashicorp/go-getter/pull/352
* Removed ova file type from the list of supported decompressors by @nywilken in https://github.com/hashicorp/go-getter/pull/354


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/hashicorp/go-getter/compare/v2.0.1...v2.0.2

name: v2.0.1
body:
## Enhancements

* Append tar and ova decompressor in v2 by @LeConTesteur in https://github.com/hashicorp/go-getter/pull/351

## Bug fixes 🐞
* fixes #320: Pass context to NewRequestWithContext so HTTP requests can… by @zeisss in https://github.com/hashicorp/go-getter/pull/324
* Ignore comments in checksum files by @azr in https://github.com/hashicorp/go-getter/pull/350

## New Contributors
* @LeConTesteur made their first contribution in https://github.com/hashicorp/go-getter/pull/351

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/hashicorp/go-getter/compare/v2.0.0...v2.0.1

name: v1.5.11
body:
## What's Changed
* Redact SSH key from URL query parameter by @macedogm in https://github.com/hashicorp/go-getter/pull/348
* gcs: only run oauth test if env var is set by @schmichael in https://github.com/hashicorp/go-getter/pull/349

## New Contributors
* @macedogm made their first contribution in https://github.com/hashicorp/go-getter/pull/348

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/hashicorp/go-getter/compare/v1.5.10...v1.5.11

name: v1.5.10
body:
* When fetching files from Google Cloud Storage, go-getter will now consider the `GOOGLE_OAUTH_ACCESS_TOKEN` environment variable as a potential source of a Google Cloud Platform access token. ([#302](https://github.com/hashicorp/go-getter/pull/302))
* Fixed a regression from v1.5.9 where `git::` sources would no longer accept direct commit ids in the optional `ref` argument, and would instead only allow named refs from the remote. As a compromise, go-getter will now accept for `ref` anything that `git checkout` would accept as a valid tree selector, _unless_ you also set `depth` to activate shallow clone mode in which case `ref` must be a named ref due to requirements of the Git protocol in that case. ([#345](https://github.com/hashicorp/go-getter/pull/345))

name: v1.5.9
body: Fix git shallow clone (`depth` parameter) for any ref. See #266

name: v1.5.8
v1.5.7
body: In 1.5.7, we moved to using signore, an internal tool, for GPG signing.

name: v1.5.5
body:
IMPROVEMENTS:

 * Added and exported tar decompressor #328 #138

name: v1.5.4
body:
IMPROVEMENTS:
* Add support to detect 5 parts s3 virtual hosted-style requests https://github.com/hashicorp/go-getter/pull/314
* Add support for insecure HttpGetter https://github.com/hashicorp/go-getter/pull/319

FIXES:
* Allow to context cancel HTTP requests #321

NOTES:
* This version requires Go 1.15+ and will no longer compile on older versions

name: v1.5.3
body:
IMPROVEMENTS:
* Add support for GCS object generations https://github.com/hashicorp/go-getter/pull/310

BUGFIXES:
* Avoid a race condition in HttpGetter https://github.com/hashicorp/go-getter/pull/315

name: v1.5.2
body:
Bug fixes:

- The goreleaser release pipeline that was created and used for the 1.5.1 release was missing the GOPRIVATE env var being set, which caused private modules to be skipped. This release contains the same code as 1.5.1, but with GOPRIVATE set to github.com/hashicorp.

name: Release v2.0.0 with split client/requests and vendored plugins
v1.5.1
body:
Enhancements:

-  Adds support for vhost-style s3 buckets (#283)

name: v1.5.0
body:
* Add support for `aws_profile` query paramter [261](https://github.com/hashicorp/go-getter/pull/261)
* Bump dependency for CVE-2020-16845 [278](https://github.com/hashicorp/go-getter/pull/278)

name: v1.4.2
body:
Improvement:

* Expose a Umask option to mask file permissions when storing local files or decompressing an archive.  Helpful for clearing `setuid` or other sensitive bits.
* feat(detector): provide a detector for repositories hosted on GitLab.com
* Use default AWS credential chain under normal circumstances

name: v1.4.1
body:
Bug Fixes:

 - Don't attempt a range request when the remote server does not report an object size #227

name: v1.4.0
body:
Bug fixes:

- Reflect Go 1.12 changes which make SCP-style URLs with explicit SSH scheme invalid https://github.com/hashicorp/go-getter/pull/205 This makes `Detector` fail early, instead of ignoring the invalid URL and letting Getter fail. This also replaces custom validation message with the one from `net/url` library in Go 1.12.8+ or any such patched versions of Go.

Enhancements:

- Support for BitBucket API 2.0 https://github.com/hashicorp/go-getter/pull/189

name: v1.3.0
body:
Bug fixes:

- Fix regression from #129 that prevented use of non-standard SSH ports for git sources. (#180)

name: v1.2.0
body:
* added GCS storage support
* added a ChecksumError type
